Production Co: VOO, Centre National du Cinéma et de L'image Animée, Seoul Metropolitan Government, Vandertastic Films, Aurora Films, Doco Digital, Korean Film Council, Belga Productions, Ciné+, Frakas Productions, Cinémage 16, BE TV, Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral Belge, Belga Films Fund, Filmförderungsanstalt, Merecinema, Cofimage 33, Anti-Archive
Synopsis: On an impulse to reconnect with her origins, Freddie, 25, returns to South Korea for the first time, where she was born before being adopted and raised in France. The headstrong young woman starts looking for her biological parents in a country she knows so little about, taking her life in new and unexpected directions.
Title: Return to Seoul
